data.text: @EU_Commission Sure. But where are democracy, human dignity and equality when 2 million of your own citizens cannot be represented in your own Parliament?
@EU_Commission 10.000.000 parlen la llengua catalana,una de les llengües romàniques...ON ES?🎗
@EU_Commission 24 languages... but not mine! Catalan is spoken by 10 million people in the UE and it’s still missing, as our catalan representatives in the @EUparliament! #ShameOnEU
@EU_Commission @SARGalileo When will We see any Galileo enabled navigation?
@EU_Commission Bzdura

Where is this equality, and what does it have to do with violence?

@EU_Commission Have a word with Merkel who sent the invite to MENA and examine your policies on unchecked illegal immigration. Reverse all these mistakes by closing borders and repatriations and it will make a difference.
@EU_Commission Great! Just great! Skills are not enough!

@EU_Commission @EUinIsrael @JunckerEU Good riddance!

@EU_Commission @LaizyDaizey @JunckerEU He was a disaster for Europe. I'm sorry his decision on Iraq has us where we are. He failed to understand the game was up for Saddam Hussein and he was deluded if he thought that America was going to reverse it's decision. The best alternate was to support Tony Blair's UN force.

@EU_Commission Not in Malta. Here it’s:
Greed,
Corruption,
Murder.

@EU_Commission non sarebbe meglio farlo capire anche a chi non sa le lingue.
Cosa si vuole ottenere pubblicando un testo che i più non possono comprendere? Chi commenta, sono per lo più analfabeti funzionali che non capiscono un testo in italiano. E si notano i commenti.

I hope in my country in the future the official Italian will be able to cancel all the stupid and incomprehensible Italian dialects...

@EU_Commission Jo sóc políglota: parlo català, castellà i anglès. Malauradament en la EC només puc escoltar dues. La meva llengua ha estat perseguida i prohibida molt temps i actualment menystinguda per l’Estat i la EC
@EU_Commission F**ck you EU!! You don't respect: My language, My elected politicians!!! you don't respect me! #shameOnEU #spanishShame

@EU_Commission Romanian: a bit of everything
Like all Romance languages, Romanian is based on Latin. But it also has influences from many other languages, including German, Hungarian, Greek, Russian, Turkish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian, Serbo-Croat, French, Italian and, more recently, English.
@EU_Commission Sou uns cínics! Una llengua que, pel cap baix, parlen 8M de persones en diferents àrees d’Europa i no l’accepteu! Cinisme pur i dur!

@EU_Commission I'm saddened to see "*The* 24 EU Languages" in the title of an official article about linguistic diversity.

The 24 are just the *official* languages. We have far more languages than that, even just counting the ones indigenous to the EU.

@EU_Commission You are stealing my vote
#freecatalanpoliticalprisoners 
#ShameonEU
#ShameonSpain
@EU_Commission 👏 👏 👏 👍 👍 👍
@EU_Commission And Catalan? Spoken by 10M but not recognized because Spain and France want to destroy it?

@EU_Commission No Catalan?! Spoken by some 10 million citizens of the European Union, the language of Catalonia is denied proper representative presence in the Parliament and other EU bodies, mainly because Spain refuses to request it.
Just one more reason of so very many for our #independence!
@EU_Commission Suspended in #Catalonia. Because you don't really believe in them. You just used them as an attack weapon against rival countries such as Russia or China. #Hypocrites #Cynics
@EU_Commission Except to Catalonia.

@EU_Commission Really, are they? I doubt it. I know way too many people coming from other European countries to my country, searching for exactly these values. None of these is valid for Sinti and Romanies in southeastern Europe. And you know it. So go and act, do your job!
